meanings.sent1: The enlarged cake was big and delicious.
meanings.sent2: The house had an enlarged garden with many flowers.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked funny with an enlarged bow on its head.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like an enlarged rainbow after the storm.
meanings.sent5: The mountain appeared even more enlarged under the setting sun.
